text: Ezɨ Elisa a inigha ghua emɨmɨrir dɨpamɨn ghugha amangsɨzir kam a mɨkɨnigha ghaze, “Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgei: Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ dɨpar kam gamizɨ, a deragha oto. Eghtɨ dɨpam ua gumazibar amutɨ, me arɨmɨghiran kogham. Egh ua amizibar amutɨ, men otɨrɨmɨrir dughiam zuamɨram otoghan kogham.”
